Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to improve the Commonwealth’s economy with a strong minimum wage and a strong tipped minimum wage
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Raises minimum wage to $15 by 2021 and indexes it to inflation. Ensures that tipped employees’ wages plus tips equal the new strengthened minimum wage.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to improve the Commonwealth’s economy with a strong minimum wage and a strong tipped minimum wage
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Raises minimum wage to $15 by 2021 and indexes it to inflation. Ensures that tipped employees’ wages plus tips equal the new strengthened minimum wage.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Initiative Petition for an Amendment to the Constitution of the Commonwealth to Provide Resources for Education and Transportation through an additional tax on incomes in excess of One Million Dollars (Fair Share Amendment)
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Creates a 4% surtax on income above $1 million (inflation-adjusted) to fund education and transportation investment.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act establishing a paid family and medical leave insurance program (Gordon-Spilka)
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Makes employees eligible for job-protected paid leave to recover from a serious illness or injury, to care for a seriously ill or injured family member, or to care for a new child.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act establishing a paid family and medical leave insurance program (Gordon-Spilka)
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Makes employees eligible for job-protected paid leave to recover from a serious illness or injury, to care for a seriously ill or injured family member, or to care for a new child.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act promoting housing and sustainable development
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Upgrades state’s zoning laws to encourage more affordable housing and transit-oriented, walkable development and promotes inclusionary zoning practices.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act establishing Medicare for All in Massachusetts
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Establishes a single payer system, in which the state provides health care to all residents as a right.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act establishing Medicare for All in Massachusetts
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Establishes a single payer system, in which the state provides health care to all residents as a right.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act modernizing the Foundation Budget for the 21st century
Shorthand Title: Robust and equitable K-12 public ed funding
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Requires the state to implement the recommendations of the the 2015 Foundation Budget Review Commission on K-12 education.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act making public higher education in Massachusetts free for residents of the state
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Establishes free college tuition and fees for all Massachusetts residents.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act promoting access to debt-free public higher education
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Establishes free college (community college and/or state university) education for students of all families earning $200,000 a year or less, covering tuition, fees, housing, and transportation costs.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act for justice reinvestment
Shorthand Title: Justice reform & reinvestment (or "jobs and education, not jails and incarceration")
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Enacts comprehensive justice reform, complementing reductions in sentencing with jobs training, youth jobs, and pre-apprenticeship programs.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act for justice reinvestment
Shorthand Title: Justice reform & reinvestment (or "jobs and education, not jails and incarceration")
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Enacts comprehensive justice reform, complementing reductions in sentencing with jobs training, youth jobs, and pre-apprenticeship programs.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to eliminate mandatory minimum sentences related to drug offenses
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Restores judicial discretion in sentencing for nonviolent drug charges, reducing the economic and social costs of extended prison terms.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to eliminate mandatory minimum sentences related to drug offenses
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Restores judicial discretion in sentencing for nonviolent drug charges, reducing the economic and social costs of extended prison terms.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to protect the civil rights and safety of all Massachusetts residents (“Safe Communities Act”)
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Prohibits the use of state resources for mass deportations or deportation raids, limits local and state police collaboration with federal immigration agents, and prohibits state support for Muslim registry.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to protect the civil rights and safety of all Massachusetts residents (“Safe Communities Act”)
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Prohibits the use of state resources for mass deportations or deportation raids, limits local and state police collaboration with federal immigration agents, and prohibits state support for Muslim registry.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to reduce the criminalization of poverty
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Eliminates or reduces numerous fees, such as parole supervision, and ensures indigent residents are not jailed or given unreasonable fees simply because they struggle to pay court-related fine.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to reduce the criminalization of poverty
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Eliminates or reduces numerous fees, such as parole supervision, and ensures indigent residents are not jailed or given unreasonable fees simply because they struggle to pay court-related fine.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act relative to advancing contraceptive coverage and economic security in our state (ACCESS)
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Updates MA’s contraceptive coverage equity law to require insurance carriers to provide all contraceptive methods without a copay.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act relative to advancing contraceptive coverage and economic security in our state (ACCESS)
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Updates MA’s contraceptive coverage equity law to require insurance carriers to provide all contraceptive methods without a copay.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act automatically registering eligible voters and enhancing safeguards against fraud
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Modernizes voter registration by automatically registering citizens who interact with government agencies and ensures that such information is handled in a secure fashion

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act automatically registering eligible voters and enhancing safeguards against fraud
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Modernizes voter registration by automatically registering citizens who interact with government agencies and ensures that such information is handled in a secure fashion

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act creating 21st Century Massachusetts clean energy jobs
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Establishes a climate adaptation and management program, sets greenhouse gas reduction targets for 2030 and 2040, accelerates the state’s Renewable Portfolio Standard (RPS), and increases commitment to offshore wind.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act relative to solar power and the green economy
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Accelerates the state’s commitment to clean energy (RPS increase) and sets 25% by 2030 solar target.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act relative to solar power and the green economy
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Accelerates the state’s commitment to clean energy (RPS increase) and sets 25% by 2030 solar target.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act clarifying authorities and responsibilities of the Department of Public Utilities
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Holds gas companies to high standard with regards to new infrastrucure and prevents massive public subsidy of new interstate gas pipelines.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act clarifying authorities and responsibilities of the Department of Public Utilities
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Holds gas companies to high standard with regards to new infrastrucure and prevents massive public subsidy of new interstate gas pipelines.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act to promote green infrastructure, reduce greenhouse gas emissions, and create jobs
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Enacts revenue-positive carbon pricing. 80% is rebated to residents while 20% is invested in green infrastructure, with a carve-out for low-income communities.

Official Name (REFER TO LEGISLATIVE AGEN: An Act combating climate change
Short Narrative Description we have on o: Enacts revenue-neutral carbon pricing. Every state resident receives an equal rebate, and employers get rebates based on their number of employees.
